title: Lynda - Data Visualization Storytelling Essentials
description:
Lynda - Data Visualization Storytelling Essentials

FYI : This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.
1h 20m Intermediate May 09, 2016 | Uploaded in May 25, 2016 by 2boweb
 
Subjects: Business IT 
Software: Excel 
Author: Bill Shander 

We are wired for story. We crave it. Storytelling has played an integral role in our ability to make progress. It should come as no surprise, then, that presenting data and information in story form maximizes the effectiveness of our communication. We can create deeper emotional responses in our audience when we present data in story form.â€¨â€¨Join data visualization expert Bill Shander as he guides you through the process of turning "facts and figures" into "story" to engage and fulfill our human expectation for information. This course is intended for anyone who works with data and has to communicate it to others, whether a researcher, a data analyst, a consultant, a marketer, or a journalist. Bill shows you how to think about, and craft, stories from data by examining many compelling stories in detail.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Creating a narrative structure for data
	â€¢	Applying narrative to data
	â€¢	Identifying what you want to say with the data
	â€¢	Analyzing what your data is saying
	â€¢	Determining what your audience needs to hear
	â€¢	Leveraging tables, charts, and visuals
	â€¢	Ensuring your narrative provides context and direction
	â€¢
